actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of those members of the class action suit, Mozelle Frey against United States of America, filed in the U.S. District Court of the Western District of Oklahoma, for whom judgments were entered by such court, but later vacated by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.

summary.text: Provides for the relief of those members of the class action suit, Mozelle Frey against United States of America, filed in the U.S. District Court of the Western District of Oklahoma, for whom judgments were entered by such court, but later vacated by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of those members of the class action suit, Mozelle Frey against United States of America, filed in the U.S. District Court of the Western District of Oklahoma, for whom judgments were entered by such court, but later vacated by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
